tool_description: Maps origin and destination addresses to carrier-specific shipping zones for accurate rate and transit time calculation.

carriers.description: List of carriers to map zones for

error_messages: Invalid postal code format: Postal codes must match country-specific formats
Invalid country code: Use valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes
Unsupported carrier: One or more carriers are not supported for zone mapping
Zone mapping failed: Unable to determine shipping zones for the provided addresses
International restrictions: Some carriers don't support the specified country pair
usage: Provide origin and destination postal codes with country codes, plus array of carriers for zone mapping. Returns carrier-specific zone information.

is_international.description: Whether this is an international shipment
